Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2011 07:02PM georgianna wrote: Please don't give up! Email your friends here whenever you need a shoulder. I thought I was fine post bilateral mastectomy, but now I can feel something in my neck collarbone area. Maybe your friends are exhausted...I don't know, but hang in there and we will root for each other.
Posts.Title: In need of a friend mossybaby chainsawz
